tasks.title: Implement User Authentication
tasks.description: Set up authentication with Angular Material forms and Firebase integration. Include login, registration, and password recovery functionalities.

tasks.title: Create Dashboard Views
tasks.description: Design and implement different dashboard views using Angular Material components. Include widgets for task summaries, charts for analytics, and user-specific widgets.

tasks.title: Develop Task Creation Form
tasks.description: Create a form using Angular Reactive Forms for users to add new tasks. Include fields for title, description, due date, priority, and assigned team members.

tasks.title: Implement Task List View
tasks.description: Develop a component to display tasks in a list format. Include sorting by priority and due date, filtering by status, and pagination.

tasks.title: Integrate Real-Time Updates
tasks.description: Use Firebase Realtime Database or Firestore to enable real-time updates for tasks. Implement notifications for new tasks, task updates, and comments.

comments.body: This task is really important and should be handed ASAP.

tasks.title: Enhance Task Collaboration
tasks.description: Implement features for task comments and attachments. Allow users to add comments, upload attachments, and tag other team members for collaboration.

tasks.title: Advanced Search Functionality
tasks.description: Develop a search component using Angular Reactive Forms and RxJS operators to allow users to search tasks by title, description, status, priority, and assigned team members.

tasks.title: Analytics and Reporting
tasks.description: Integrate Chart.js for analytics graphs and reports. Display task completion rate, task distribution by status and priority, and user activity metrics on the dashboard.

tasks.title: Testing and Deployment
tasks.description: Set up unit tests using Jasmine and Karma for components, services, and state management. Implement end-to-end tests using Protractor for critical user workflows. Prepare for deployment to a staging environment with Firebase Hosting.
